duties_responsibilities.duty: Process and review bankruptcy information from U.S. Bankruptcy Courts, Clients, Attorneys, and/or Trustees.
Conduct research and analyze account/case status, notating case dispositions and ensuring adherence to bankruptcy laws.
File Proofs of Claim accurately and prepare and file bankruptcy motions and reaffirmation agreements.
Assist in managing bankruptcy cases by processing daily mail, handling critical event reports, and addressing loan documentation issues.
Take inbound calls from clients, attorneys, trustees, and internal departments, ensuring compliance with internal and bankruptcy guidelines.
Exhibit mastery of Bankruptcy Production Specialist I role and train other team members on best practices.

education_certification.credential: High School diploma or equivalent, bankruptcy experience, and mastery of Bankruptcy Production Specialist I skills. Associate's paralegal degree or legal secretarial training preferred.
